nodes.text: Tepasi was a planet located in the galaxy's Core Worlds that was the homeworld of General Cassio Tagge, a member of the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War who was born into nobility and privilege. It shared its name with Tepasi taffy.

Tepasi was first mentioned in HoloNet News Vol. 531 49, a series of Star Wars Legends in-universe news articles released in 2002 as part of the HoloNet News website written by Pablo Hidalgo and Paul Ens. The world was confirmed to be canon in the reference book Ultimate Star Wars, which was released in 2015.
